body: If I could read Japanese, I'd translate this. As I can't, I won't. But I'll be happy to edit/proof/layout English text if anyone can provide even a rough trans of the untranslated chapters. (I'm an amateur cartoonist & illustrator, a lifelong design geek with decent PS skills, and I've worked professionally as an English language copywriter & editor).
Anyone know a circle taking commissions? That might be our only hope, here.
I found ch 1-4 in Spanish, but still nothing for English.  It seems this work has been forgotten sadge
Meanwhile, I have the four years I spent learning Japanese in high school, a kanji dictionary, and far too much time. Heh. ...Wait, isn't that kind of sad? I can only do this because I'm a NEET...
and bonus chapter too of course.
My god, how this isn't translated to english yet... First 2 chapters are already in english 1 year ago. I'm waiting so much for chapter 3&4 in english.
We're not getting chapters 3-4 are we? :(
Translation of the 4 chapters please + the bonus weekend chap
